(My last post until I get back from vacation)
::Galvatron laid in his new quarters::
Computer: Nemises is close enough for a low power test
Galvatron: Do it.
::The ray from Nemises fires, hitting Soundwave, Bluestreak, Ratchet, Torca, 
and Sideswipe, deactivating them for 5 days.(DONT interfere) Galvatron falls 
asleep::
